awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.

fullplot: This film depicts World War II through the eyes of several Dutch students. It follows them through the beginning of the war, the Nazi occupation and the liberation.
plot: This film depicts World War II through the eyes of several Dutch students. It follows them through the beginning of the war, the Nazi occupation and the liberation.
title: Soldier of Orange
